title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - NFL Week 11 Picks and Betting Breakdown, "Fake Q's, Real Answers" on Cowboys and Kyrie
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - NFL Week 11 Picks and Betting Breakdown, "Fake Q's, Real Answers" on Cowboys and Kyrie
description:
Colin does "Fake Questions, Real Answers" on the struggling college program that could make the quickest comeback (3:00), the most interesting potential storyline for Kyrie and KD (5:00), whether it's wrong to mock Zion for his weight gain (6:00), the Super Bowl winner that would confuse everybody (7:00), and why the NFL continues to dominate sports talk (8:00). Then, The Action Network's Chad Millman tells Colin if his NFL Week 11 picks are "sharp" or "square". They make their picks for Steelers/Chargers (11:00), Washington/Panthers (13:00), Ravens/Bears (15:00), Cowboys/Chiefs (16:00), Cardinals/Seahawks (23:00), Saints/Eagles (25:00), Giants/Buccaneers (26:00), Packers/Vikings (29:00), Dolphins/Jets, (31:00)Texans/Titans (32:00), and Colts/Bills (33:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
